content:
Fall 2014: Theory Seminar
Donald Bren Hall, Room 1425, 1:00pm
October 10, 2014:

Curves in Graph Drawing

David Eppstein

We review graph drawing methods that use curves to represent edges, including arc diagrams, layered graph drawing, hyperbolic drawing, planar graph layouts, force-directed methods, edge bundling, confluent drawing, and Lombardi drawing.
